img.title: Wifi Logo
img.style: font-size: 13.3333px; text-align: center; top: 286px; width: 133px; height: 111px; vertical-align: middle;

tr.td:
Coronavirus Updates on the resource website to include:
What are expectations for teachers?
How will grades be calculated?
Guidance on graduation, awarding credits, and instructions
Resources for social and emotional well-being
FREE WIFI at multiple school locations: EHES, CCHS, EVHS, PSES and now, FTBMS. NEW - Germanna Daniel Technology Center also has free WiFi available in their front, parking lot. Additional public locations may be found here.
Hours 8 AM - 8 PM, please maintain Social Distancing
Code of Conduct rules still apply
En español
